methods.name: getViewInfo

returnValue.description:
JSON-like object which holds the current view information. See setViewInfo. In addition to properties defined in setViewInfo the output from getViewInfo contains camera view and projection matrices 

  {
    ...
    camera: {
      ...
      matrices: {
        view:       [number, ...],
        projection: [number, ...],
      }
      ...
    },
    ...
  }

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Query object which indicates what information to be retrieved.

parameters.name: camera
parameters.description: Indicator to retrieve camera information.

parameters.name: matrices
parameters.description: Indicator to retrieve camera view and projection matrices.

parameters.name: useTransitionCamera
parameters.description: Indicator to retrieve the transition camera properties instead of regular one's.

parameters.name: animation
parameters.description: Indicator to retrieve animation information.

parameters.name: visibility
parameters.description: Indicator to retrieve visibility information.

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: Indicator to retrieve the complete visibility definition or just the difference.

parameters.name: selection
parameters.description: Indicator to retrieve selection information.

methods.description: Retrieves information about the current camera view in the scene, and saves the information in a JSON-like object. The information can then be used at a later time to restore the scene to the same camera view using the setViewInfo method.

methods.name: setViewInfo

returnValue.description: this to allow method chaining.

parameters.name: viewInfo
parameters.description: A JSON-like object containing view information acquired using the getViewInfo method.

parameters.name: camera
parameters.description: A JSON-like object containing the camera information.

parameters.name: rotation
parameters.description: Rotation defined in Aircraft principal axes .

parameters.name: yaw
parameters.description: Angle around the vertical axis in degrees.

parameters.name: pitch
parameters.description: Angle around the lateral axis in degrees.

parameters.name: roll
parameters.description: Angle around the longitudinal axis in degrees.

parameters.name: position
parameters.description: Position defined in 3-dimensional space.

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: X coordinate.

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: Y coordinate.

parameters.name: z
parameters.description: Z coordinate.

parameters.name: bindingType
parameters.description: Camera field of view binding type.

parameters.name: projectionType
parameters.description: Camera projection type.

parameters.name: fieldOfView
parameters.description: Camera field of view in degrees. Applicable only to perspective cameras.

parameters.name: zoomFactor
parameters.description: Camera zoom factor. Applicable only to orthographic cameras.

parameters.name: animation
parameters.description: A JSON-like object containing the animation information.

parameters.name: stepVeId
parameters.description: Step VE ID. If it is omitted then procedure and step indices are used.

parameters.name: procedureIndex
parameters.description: Procedure index in the list of procedures.

parameters.name: stepIndex
parameters.description: Step index in the list of steps in the procedure.

parameters.name: animationTime
parameters.description: Time at which to activate the step.

parameters.name: visibility
parameters.description: A JSON-like object containing the visibility information.

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: If the mode equals to complete then the visible and hidden fields are defined. If the mode equals differences then the changes field is defined.

parameters.name: visible
parameters.description: List of Ids of visible nodes.

parameters.name: hidden
parameters.description: List of Ids of hidden nodes.

parameters.name: changes
parameters.description: List of Ids of nodes with inverted visibility.

parameters.name: flyToDuration
parameters.description: Fly-to animation duration in seconds.

methods.description:
Sets the current scene to use the camera view information acquired from the getViewInfo method.
Internally, the setViewInfo method activates certain steps at certain animation times, and then changes the camera position, rotation and field of view (FOV) / zoom factor.

returnValue.description: this to allow method chaining.

parameters.name: nodeRefs
parameters.description: The node reference or the array of node references that we want to tint.

parameters.name: show
parameters.description: Whether to highlight the nodes or remove the highlight.

parameters.name: color
parameters.description: The color to use for highlighting the nodes passed as argument.

methods.name: tap

returnValue.description: this to allow method chaining.

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: The tap gesture's x-coordinate.

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: The tap gesture's y-coordinate.

parameters.name: isDoubleClick
parameters.description: Indicates whether the tap gesture should be interpreted as a double-click. A value of true indicates a double-click gesture, and false indicates a single click gesture.

methods.description: Executes a click or tap gesture.

methods.name: zoomTo

returnValue.description: this

parameters.name: what
parameters.description: What set of nodes to zoom to.

parameters.name: nodeRef
parameters.description: Is only used if what == sap.ui.vk.ZoomTo.Node.

parameters.name: crossFadeSeconds
parameters.description: Time to perform the "fly to" animation. Set to 0 to do this immediately.

parameters.name: margin
parameters.description: Margin. Set to 0 to zoom to the entire screen.

methods.description: Zooms the scene to a bounding box created from a particular set of nodes.

events.name: nodeClicked

parameters.name: nodeRef
parameters.description: Returns a node reference.

events.description:
This event will be fired when a node is clicked.

This event bubbles up the control hierarchy.

events.name: nodesPicked

parameters.name: picked
parameters.description: References of the nodes that are picked.

events.description:
This event is fired when nodes in the scene are picked by user action. If application requires different selection behaviour then it can handle this event and implement its own selection method. In this case selectionMode property should be set to sap.ui.vk.SelectionMode.None Application can modify list of picked node references to alter selection behaviour.

This event bubbles up the control hierarchy.

This event bubbles up the control hierarchy.

This event is fired when a URL in a note is clicked.

methods.name: stickySelectionHandler

parameters.name: nodes
parameters.description: Array of node references

parameters.name: nodeRefs
parameters.description: The node reference or the array of node references.

methods.description:
Gets the opacity of the node.

If a single node reference is passed to the method then a single value is returned.
If an array of node references is passed to the method then an array of values is returned.

returnValue.description: A single value or an array of values. Value null means that the node's own tint color should be used.

returnValue.description: A single value or an array of values where the value is true if the node is selected, false otherwise.

parameters.name: nodeRefs
parameters.description: The node reference or the array of node references.

methods.description:
Gets the outlining state of the node.

If a single node reference is passed to the method then a single outlining state is returned.
If an array of node references is passed to the method then an array of outlining states is returned.

parameters.description: The node reference or the array of node references.

methods.description:
Gets the selection state of the node.

If a single node reference is passed to the method then a single selection state is returned.
If an array of node references is passed to the method then an array of selection states is returned.

methods.name: getShowSelectionBoundingBox

returnValue.description: true if bounding boxes of selected nodes are shown, false otherwise.

methods.description: Gets if showing the bounding box when nodes are selected

methods.name: getSymbolNodes

returnValue.description: An array of nodes

parameters.name: nodeId
parameters.description: node Id string, optional

methods.description: Get the Symbol node from nodeId, if nodeId is not set, returns a collection of all Symbol nodes

experimental.text: This method is experimental and might be modified or removed in future versions

methods.name: getTintColor

returnValue.description: A single value or an array of values. Value null means that the node's own tint color should be used.

parameters.name: nodeRefs
parameters.description: The node reference or the array of node references.

parameters.name: inABGRFormat
parameters.description: This flag indicates to return the tint color in the ABGR format, if it equals false then the color is returned in the CSS color format.

methods.description:
Gets the tint color of the node.

If a single node reference is passed to the method then a single value is returned.
If an array of node references is passed to the method then an array of values is returned.

methods.name: getVisibilityChanges

returnValue.description: The visibility changes are in the form of an array. The array is a list of node VE ids which suffered a visibility changed relative to the default state.

methods.description: Gets the visibility changes in the current ViewStateManager object.

methods.name: getVisibilityState

returnValue.description: A single value or an array of values where the value is true if the node is visible, false otherwise.

parameters.name: nodeRefs
parameters.description: The node reference or the array of node references.

methods.description:

If a single node reference is passed to the method then a single visibility state is returned.
If an array of node references is passed to the method then an array of visibility states is returned.

symbols.title: class sap.ui.vk.ViewStateManager

symbols.name: sap.ui.vk.ViewStateManagerBase
symbols.description: Manages the visibility and selection states of nodes in the scene.

parameters.name: sId
parameters.description: ID for the new ViewStateManagerBase object. Generated automatically if no ID is given.

parameters.name: mSettings
parameters.description: Initial settings for the new ViewStateManagerBase object.

constructor.description:
Constructor for a new ViewStateManagerBase.

Accepts an object literal mSettings that defines initial property values, aggregated and associated objects as well as event handlers. See sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#constructor for a general description of the syntax of the settings object.

events.name: highlightColorChanged

parameters.name: highlightColor
parameters.description: Highlighting color

parameters.name: highlightColorABGR
parameters.description: Highlighting color in the ABGR format.

events.description:
This event is fired when highlighting color is changed.

This event bubbles up the control hierarchy.

events.name: nodeHierarchyReplaced

parameters.name: oldNodeHierarchy
parameters.description: Old node hierarchy

parameters.name: newNodeHierarchy
parameters.description: New node hierarchy

events.description: This event is fired when the node hierarchy is replaced.

events.name: opacityChanged

parameters.name: changed
parameters.description: References of nodes whose opacity changed.

parameters.name: opacity
parameters.description: Opacity assigned to the nodes. Could be either float or float[] if event was fired from a bulk operation.

events.description:
This event is fired when opacity of the nodes is changed.

This event bubbles up the control hierarchy.

events.name: outlineColorChanged

parameters.name: outlineColor
parameters.description: Outlining color

parameters.name: outlineColorABGR
parameters.description: Outlining color in the ABGR format.

events.description:
This event is fired when outlining color is changed.

This event bubbles up the control hierarchy.

events.name: outlineWidthChanged

parameters.name: width
parameters.description: Outline width

events.description:
This event is fired when outline width is changed.

This event bubbles up the control hierarchy.

events.name: outliningChanged

parameters.name: outlined
parameters.description: References of newly outlined nodes.

parameters.name: unoutlined
parameters.description: References of newly unoutlined nodes.

events.description:
This event is fired when the nodes are outlined/unoutlined.

This event bubbles up the control hierarchy.

events.name: readyForAnimation
events.description: This event is fired when viewport is ready for playing animation (e.g, camera is ready).

events.name: selectionChanged

parameters.name: selected
parameters.description: References of newly selected nodes.

parameters.name: unselected
parameters.description: References of newly unselected nodes.

events.description:
This event is fired when the nodes are selected/unselected.

This event bubbles up the control hierarchy.

events.name: tintColorChanged

parameters.name: changed
parameters.description: References of nodes whose tint color changed.

parameters.name: tintColor
parameters.description: Tint color assigned to the nodes. Could be either sap.ui.core.CSSColor or sap.ui.core.CSSColor[] if event was fired from a bulk operation.

parameters.name: tintColorABGR
parameters.description: Tint color in the ABGR format assigned to the nodes. Could be either int or int[] if event was fired from a bulk operation.

events.description:
This event is fired when tint color of the nodes is changed.

This event bubbles up the control hierarchy.

events.name: transformationChanged

parameters.name: changed
parameters.description: Reference to a changed node or array of node references.

parameters.name: transformation
parameters.description: Node's transformation or array of nodes' transforms Transformation object will contain the following fields of type float[]: translation scale angleAxis | euler | quaternion

events.description: This event is fired when node's transformation changed.

events.name: viewStateApplied
events.description: This event is fired when View activated.

events.name: viewStateApplying
events.description: This event is fired when View is about to be activated.

events.name: visibilityChanged

parameters.name: visible
parameters.description: References of newly shown nodes.

parameters.name: hidden
parameters.description: IDs of newly hidden nodes.

events.description:
This event is fired when the visibility of the node changes.

This event bubbles up the control hierarchy.
